name: Ka'agui Pyntū
description:
Global standart life is a life opposite to the original people's tradition. We have lost our natural abilities, our bodily strength, our function to create and collaborate together with the environment.

Many species lost because the violence against the forests, but who can survive inside it? Why we destroy what we fear? Who is afraid of the dark forest?

In Guarani (Brazilian original peoples language) it means:
Ka'agui= da mata / from the forest
Pyntū= noite, escure / night, dark

Gouache, watercolor, acrylic and digital painting.
by @numadessas at HIC ET NUNC
